comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Clarence Page Townsley (September 24, 1855–December 28, 1926) was career United States Army officer who became superintendent of the United States Military Academy. Source: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clarence_Page_Townsley

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks Wystan and Richard.  We'll make the correction to the name in the title the next time we update the record.
